languages.text: "Совсем рядом, дальше по коридору. Здесь же расположены кабинет и приемная зала". {n}Белоснежная улыбка озаряет лицо Ахиллеаса, возвращая его лицу часть былой привлекательности.{/n} "Кабинет Леди Теодоры стоял запертым с момента ее последнего отбытия, однако ввиду вашего прибытия мы приказали привести помещение в порядок — оно готово к работе в любой момент".

traits.locale_text: "Совсем рядом, дальше по коридору. Здесь же расположены кабинет и приемная зала". {n}Белоснежная улыбка озаряет лицо Ахиллеаса, возвращая его лицу часть былой привлекательности.{/n} "Кабинет леди Теодоры стоял запертым с момента ее последнего отбытия, однако ввиду вашего прибытия мы приказали привести помещение в порядок — оно готово к работе в любой момент".

languages.text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."
languages.original_text: "Совсем рядом, дальше по коридору. Здесь же расположены кабинет и приемная зала". {n}Белоснежная улыбка озаряет лицо Ахиллеаса, возвращая его лицу часть былой привлекательности.{/n} "Кабинет Леди Теодоры стоял запертым с момента ее последнего отбытия, однако ввиду вашего прибытия мы приказали привести помещение в порядок — оно готово к работе в любой момент".

traits.locale_text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience hall are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, and it brings back some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've ordered it to be tidied up — it's available at any moment."

"They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience hall are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, and it brings back some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've ordered it to be tidied up — it's available at any moment."

"They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

"They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

"They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

languages.text: “您的房间离得很近，就在大厅里，书房和觐见室也在那边。”{n}阿吉里亚斯脸上露出了珍珠般的笑容，你似乎看到了他曾一度英气逼人的样子。{/n}“自从西奥多拉夫人离开之后，她的书房就一直锁着。但考虑到您的到来，我们已经安排人把它整理好了。只要您需要，就可以随时使用书房。”
languages.original_text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

traits.locale_text: “您的房间离得很近，就在大厅里，书房和觐见室也在那边。”{n}阿吉里亚斯脸上露出了珍珠般的笑容，你似乎看到了他曾一度英气逼人的样子。{/n}“自从西奥多拉夫人离开之后，她的书房就一直锁着。但考虑到您的到来，我们已经安排人把它整理好了。只要您需要，就可以随时使用书房。”

languages.text: «Están muy cerca, por ese pasillo. También encontrará el estudio y la sala de audiencias». {n}El rostro de Achilleas se ilumina con una sonrisa perlada que restaura parte de su antiguo atractivo.{/n} «El estudio de lady Theodora lleva cerrado con llave desde que se fue pero, con motivo de su llegada, hemos hecho que se ordene. Está listo para lo que necesite».
languages.original_text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

traits.locale_text: «Están muy cerca, por ese pasillo. También encontrará el estudio y la sala de audiencias». {n}El rostro de Achilleas se ilumina con una sonrisa perlada que restaura parte de su antiguo atractivo.{/n} «El estudio de lady Theodora lleva cerrado con llave desde que se fue pero, con motivo de su llegada, hemos hecho que se ordene. Está listo para lo que necesite».

languages.text: 「廊下を奥に進んだすぐ側にございます。書斎や謁見所も同じ場所にございます」{n}アキレアスは真珠のように真っ白な歯が並んだ笑顔を見せ、かつての美貌を少し取り戻したようだった。{/n}「シオドーラ様の書斎は最後に出発されて以来鍵がかかったままでしたが、御身の到着に伴い片づけておきました。必要であればいつでもご利用ください」
languages.original_text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

traits.locale_text: 「廊下を奥に進んだすぐ側にございます。書斎や謁見所も同じ場所にございます」{n}アキレアスは真珠のように真っ白な歯が並んだ笑顔を見せ、かつての美貌を少し取り戻したようだった。{/n}「シオドーラ様の書斎は最後に出発されて以来鍵がかかったままでしたが、御身の到着に伴い片づけておきました。必要であればいつでもご利用ください」

languages.text: "Ganz in der Nähe, nur den Gang hinunter. Dort befinden sich auch das Arbeitszimmer und die Audienzkammer." {n}Achilleas' Gesicht hellt sich mit einem perlenweißen Lächeln auf, das sein früheres gutes Aussehen zum Teil wiederherstellt.{/n} "Lady Theodoras Arbeitszimmer ist seit ihrer letzten Abreise verschlossen, aber wir haben es wegen Eurer Ankunft sauber machen lassen – es steht Euch jederzeit zur Verfügung."
languages.original_text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz in der Nähe, nur den Gang hinunter. Dort befinden sich auch das Arbeitszimmer und die Audienzkammer." {n}Achilleas' Gesicht hellt sich mit einem perlenweißen Lächeln auf, das sein früheres gutes Aussehen zum Teil wiederherstellt.{/n} "Lady Theodoras Arbeitszimmer ist seit ihrer letzten Abreise verschlossen, aber wir haben es wegen Eurer Ankunft sauber machen lassen – es steht Euch jederzeit zur Verfügung."

languages.text: « Ils sont juste au bout du hall. Vous y trouverez également votre bureau et une salle d'audience. » {n}Le visage d'Achilleas s'illumine soudain d'un sourire éclatant, lui redonnant un peu de son charme.{/n} « Personne n'avait pénétré dans le bureau de dame Théodora depuis son départ, mais à l'annonce de votre arrivée, nous l'avons fait remettre en ordre. Il est à votre entière disposition. »
languages.original_text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont juste au bout du hall. Vous y trouverez également votre bureau et une salle d'audience. » {n}Le visage d'Achilleas s'illumine soudain d'un sourire éclatant, lui redonnant un peu de son charme.{/n} « Personne n'avait pénétré dans le bureau de dame Théodora depuis son départ, mais à l'annonce de votre arrivée, nous l'avons fait remettre en ordre. Il est à votre entière disposition. »

languages.text: "Şurada, hemen holün sonunda. Çalışma odası ve kabul salonu da oradalar." {n}Achilleas'ın yüzü; ona eski yakışıklılığının bir kısmını geri kazandıran, inci beyazı bir gülüşle parlıyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'nın çalışma odası, son gidişinden beri kilitli tutuluyordu. Gelişiniz sebebiyle toplanması emrini verdik. Ne zaman isterseniz emrinize amadedir."
languages.original_text: "They are very close, just down the hall. That is also where the study and the audience chamber are." {n}Achilleas's face brightens with a pearly-white smile, restoring some of his former good looks.{/n} "Lady Theodora's study has remained locked since her last departure, but, on account of your arrival, we've arranged for it to be tidied up — it is ready whenever you may need it."

traits.locale_text: "Çok yakında, hemen holün sonunda. Çalışma odası ve kabul salonu da oradalar." {n}Achilleas'ın yüzü inci beyazı bir gülüşle parlıyor ve ona eski yakışıklılığının bir kısmını geri kazandırıyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'nın çalışma odası son ayrılışından beri kilitli tutuluyor ancak sizin gelişiniz sebebiyle toplanması emrini verdik. Ne zaman isterseniz emrinize amadedir."
